creator: Popoko VM Games
descriptionHtml:
Sie können 4 Gewinnt mit der Familie genießen oder in verschiedenen Schwierigkeitsstufen gegen den Computer spielen.

Vergleichen Sie in den Weltweiten High-Scores Ihre Spielkünste mit den Leistungen anderer Spieler weltweit!
Bereit?
Tippen Sie eine palte an, um Ihren ersten Stein in diese zu werfen!
Viel Glück!^__-

Sie erhalten auch Erfahrungspunkte indem Sie gegen Computer gewinnen (+1 für Einfach, +3 für Medium, +5 für Schwer, und +7 für Experte).

Unterstütze das Spielen von Online-Spielen mit Tausenden von Spielern!

Vergleichen Sie in den Weltweiten High-Scores Ihre Spielkünste mit den Leistungen anderer Spieler weltweit!

Features:
* Rückgängig-Funktion
* Automatisches Speichern, wenn Sie die Anwendung beenden
* Auf Zeit basierendes Spiel
* Online spielen
* Großartige Grafik und aufregende Soundeffekte
* Herausragender Antrieb mit künstlicher Intelligenz mit konfigurierbarem Schwierigkeitsgrad
* Drehung des Spielbrett im Zweispieler-Modus

Vier gewinnt (englisch: Connect Four) ist ein Zweipersonen-Strategiespiel mit dem Ziel, als Erster vier der eigenen Spielsteine in eine Linie zu bringen.
descriptionShort: Best Connect Four game is here.

appDetails.developerAddress: Dong Khoi, Quan 1, Ho Chi Minh

title: Vier Gewinnt

container.value: Dong Khoi, Quan 1, Ho Chi Minh

creator: Popoko VM Games
descriptionHtml:
Four in a Row (Connect Four) is a two-player connection game in which the players first choose a color and then take turns dropping colored discs from the top into a seven-column, six-row vertically suspended grid. The pieces fall straight down, occupying the next available space within the column. The objective of the game is to connect four of one's own discs of the same color next to each other vertically, horizontally, or diagonally before your opponent.

Four in a Row brings this great game to your Android phone. You can enjoy 4 in a Row in family game time, or you can also enjoy the game by playing with the AIs of varying difficulties. Beware that it is very challenging to beat the best AI in this game!

You will also gain experience points by winning against the AIs (+1 for Easy, +3 for Medium, +5 for Hard, and +7 for Expert).

Features:
* Undo
* Save/load unfinished game
* AIs with 4 levels of difficulties
* Timer based game
* Playing online
descriptionShort: The best 4 in a Row game is here!

appDetails.developerAddress: Dong Khoi, Quan 1, Ho Chi Minh

title: Four in a Row

container.value: Dong Khoi, Quan 1, Ho Chi Minh

creator: Popoko VM Games
descriptionHtml:
Dive into the captivating world of "4 in a Row", your new go-to game for endless fun and challenging gameplay! Engage in thrilling one-on-one battles, strategically dropping colored discs into a dynamic grid and aiming for that exhilarating moment when you align four pieces and emerge victorious!

Elegant Design, Infinite Enjoyment
Our meticulously crafted design ensures a visually stunning and intuitive gameplay experience. Revel in the beauty of customized piece and board sets that make every game a unique visual journey.

AI Challenges Await!
Step into the arena against AI opponents that scale to your skill level. From beginners to the most seasoned players, five levels of AI difficulty promise nail-biting challenges and triumphant victories. Can you conquer the expert AI that stands as the ultimate test of your strategic prowess?

Track Your Journey
Accumulate experience points with every AI you vanquish. Climb the ranks and earn bragging rights as you master the art of "4 in a Row". Every victory brings you closer to becoming a legend.

Innovative Features

Undo: Made a mistake? No worries! Step back and refine your strategy.
Save/Load: Jump back into the action anytime, with saved games that let you pick up right where you left off.
Timer-Based Gameplay: Feel the adrenaline rush as you race against the clock, making each move count!
Family and Friends - The More, The Merrier!
Transform family game nights and friendly get-togethers with "4 in a Row". The classic gameplay, modernized for the digital age, promises laughter, competition, and unforgettable moments.

Download "4 in a Row" Now!
Your journey to becoming a "4 in a Row" champion begins today. With an elegant design, challenging AIs, and a plethora of innovative features, every game promises a unique and exhilarating experience. Ready for the challenge?
descriptionShort: Unleash the Fun with 4 in a Row!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New background themes.
- New piece sets and board sets.
- New feature: Board Editor.
- Tutorial feature added for new players.
- Custom player avatars and sound effects.
- Bug fixes and performance improvements.
